abstract: Steven Bowditch wins AT&T Byron Nelson golf tournament in Irving, Tex; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Steven Bowditch closed with a five-under-par 64 for a four-shot victory in the AT&T Byron Nelson at the TPC Four Seasons in Irving, Tex.
snippet: Steven Bowditch closed with a five-under-par 64 for a four-shot victory in the AT&T Byron Nelson at the TPC Four Seasons in Irving, Tex.
